name: Chloe: The New White Witch
description:
Chloe: The New White Witch

CONTROLS

Press Right Arrow to move forward 

Press SPACE to jump

Code Coven - Intro To Game Making - Assignement #3

Goal: Use provided scripts and your existing knowledge to create a unique 2D gameplay experience. Projects should build on the Platformer base project. Get creative with it! Find interesting ways to use and modify the provided scripts.

Requirements:

  • Script modification, edit or add to existing scripts for unique gameplay. 
  • Controllable character.
  • Replace art assets, use free assets from the Unity Store or create your own!
  • Implement music and audio.
  • If the character "dies", restart the game scene.
  • Playable build submitted on Monday at the start of class.
  • An ending!

Challenges! (Optional, but fun! Pick any, all, or none.)

  • Create more than one gameplay scene with a scene transition for multiple levels
  • Implement a timer or score counter
  • Record and implement your own sound effects
  • Create a two player game with two controllable characters
  • Create your own art assets and use them in the game
  • Implement a double jump!

---

Designer's Note: I really wanted to create a narratively driven experience, because that is the space I hope to take up in this industry. The story is based on a character that exists within a Living World called Pastoria that is home to many different multimedia projects including tabletop roleplaying games, digital games, interactive fiction, prose fiction and more. You can find more about Pastoria here.
